name: In the Matter of the ADOPTION OF A.F. Petition of CHILDREN'S SERVICES OF ERIE COUNTY
name_abbreviation: In re the Adoption of A.F.

parties: In the Matter of the ADOPTION OF A.F. Petition of CHILDREN’S SERVICES OF ERIE COUNTY.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The petition for allowance of appeal is granted and the order of Superior Court, 334 Pa.Super. 53, 482 A.2d 1076, is reversed. See Matter of G.T.M., 506 Pa. 44, 483 A.2d 1355 (1984). The final decree of Erie County Court of Common Pleas, Orphans’ Court Division, terminating the parental rights of the natural mother of A.F., is reinstated.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
494 A.2d 1049
In the Matter of the ADOPTION OF A.F. Petition of CHILDREN’S SERVICES OF ERIE COUNTY.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 12, 1985.
